snippet: The bid is the latest effort in a battle to gain control of Asia Pacific Breweries, the beer business jointly owned by Heineken and Fraser & Neave.
abstract: The bid is the latest effort in a battle to gain control of Asia Pacific Breweries, the beer business jointly owned by Heineken and Fraser & Neave.

headline.main: Thai Billionaire Tries to Edge Out Heineken for Singaporean Brewery
